data.taskTitle: Extension: Screenshot capture (full page and visible)
Extension: Screenshot capture (full page and visible)
data.approach: Implement comprehensive screenshot functionality: 1) Visible area capture using chrome.tabs.captureVisibleTab (already exists), 2) Full page capture via scrolling and stitching using Canvas API, 3) Basic annotation tools (draw, arrow, text, blur) using Canvas overlay, 4) Crop to selected element feature, 5) Image compression before upload. Will create screenshot.ts module with ScreenshotCapture class.

data.taskTitle: Extension: Screenshot capture (full page and visible)
summary: Implemented visible area capture using chrome.tabs.captureVisibleTab
Implemented full page capture via scroll-and-stitch with Canvas API
Added element screenshot capture with click-to-select picker
Created annotation editor with draw, arrow, rectangle, text, blur, and highlight tools
Added image compression functionality with configurable max width and quality
Updated popup UI with separate buttons for each capture type
reviewFocus: Verify full page capture works on long pages
Test annotation tools in the editor
Confirm element screenshot picker works correctly
